original: @115a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @115a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: rakta ya m'a ri mandala p'u dza bidhi n'a ma /
analyzed: rakta ya m'a ri mandala p'u dza bidhi n'a ma /
translated: Raktayamarimandala-puja-vidhi-nama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: gshin rje gshed dmar po mandala du mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
analyzed: gshin rje gshed dmar po mandala du mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
translated: The Red Yamantaka Mandala Offering Ritual

original: gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Red Yamantaka.

original: @115b ya th'a hi dz'a ta m'a tre na sna pi ta /
analyzed: @115b ya th'a hi dz'a ta m'a tre na sna pi ta /
translated: Ya tha hi dzah tre na pi ta.

original: sarba ta th'a ga t'a bhi she kam sa ma y'a shri ye h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sarba ta th'a ga t'a bhi she kam sa ma y'a shri ye h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Sarva tathagata abhi sheka ma sa ma ya shri ye hum phat sva ha.

original: zhes pas khrus bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pas khrus bya'o //
translated: With this, one should bathe.

original: aom a'a:hr'i:sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a:hr'i:sv'a h'a /
translated: Om a: hri: sva ha.

original: zhes pas lag pa dang / rkang pa kha bshal ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: zhes pas lag pa dang / rkang pa kha bshal ba'i sngags so //
translated: With this, one should wash one's hands and feet.

original: aom na mo bha ga w'a ti pushpa ke tu r'a dz'a ya ta th'a ga ta y'arha tes myaksam buddh'a ya /
analyzed: aom na mo bha ga w'a ti pushpa ke tu r'a dz'a ya ta th'a ga ta y'arha tes myaksam buddh'a ya /
translated: Om namo bhagavatyai puspaketur-ajaaya tathaagatayaarha(te)sammam-buddhayaa.

original: tadya th'a / aom pushpe pushpe ma h'a pushpe /🔽su pushpe / pushpe audbha ba /
analyzed: tadya th'a / aom pushpe pushpe ma h'a pushpe / su pushpe / pushpe audbha ba /
translated: Tadyatha. Om pushe pushe mahaapushe.🔽 Suapushe pushodvaha.

original: pushpa sam bha be /
analyzed: pushpa sam bha be /
translated: Pusham-bhave.

original: pushp'a ba kirne sv'a h'a /
analyzed: pushp'a ba kirne sv'a h'a /
translated: Pushavaakirne sva ha.🔽 Om a: hum.

original: aom a'a:h'um / zhes pas gtor ma byin gyis brlab bo //
analyzed: aom a'a:h'um / zhes pas gtor ma byin gyis brlab bo //
translated: With this, one should consecrate the torma.

original: aom ya m'anta kam sarba bighn'a nutsh'a da ya h'um phat /
analyzed: aom ya m'anta kam sarba bighn'a nutsh'a da ya h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ yamāntaka sarva-vighnān utsādaya hūṃ phaṭ.

original: ces pa'i sngags kyi me tog dang // chu lag pa'i nang du bzung ste /
analyzed: ces pa'i sngags kyi me tog dang // chu lag pa'i nang du bzung ste /
translated: With this mantra, one should scatter flowers and hold water in one's hands.

original: sa la bran pa ni bgegs bskrad pa'o //
analyzed: sa la bran pa ni bgegs bskrad pa'o //
translated: Scattering on the ground is the expulsion of obstructors.

original: aom hr'i:ha:bho ma h'a kro dha a'a gatstsha sm'a ta p'u dza pra ti grihna pra s'a dha mam ku ru sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i:ha:bho ma h'a kro dha a'a gatstsha sm'a ta p'u dza pra ti grihna pra s'a dha mam ku ru sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ haḥ bho mahākrodha āgaccha samaya pūja pratigṛhaṇa prasādhaya mama siddhiṃ kuru svāhā.

original: zhes pas spyan drang ngo //
analyzed: zhes pas spyan drang ngo //
translated: With this, one should invite.

original: aom hr'i:shtri:ha zhes pas yon chab bo //
analyzed: aom hr'i:shtri:ha zhes pas yon chab bo //
translated: With Oṃ hrīḥ śrīḥ haḥ, one should offer water for the feet.

original: aom a'a: h'um phat ces pas zhal bsil lo //
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um phat ces pas zhal bsil lo //
translated: With Oṃ āḥ hūṃ phaṭ, one should offer water for the mouth.

original: aom dushta satva da ma ka ga:zhes pas dri chab kyi sngags so //🔽aom badzra bh'u mi h'um phat /🔽aom badzra go ma ya h'um phat /
analyzed: aom dushta satva da ma ka ga:zhes pas dri chab kyi sngags so // aom badzra bh'u mi h'um phat / aom badzra go ma ya h'um phat /
translated: With Oṃ duṣṭasatva damāka gaḥ, one should offer scented water.🔽Oṃ vajra bhūmi hūṃ phaṭ.🔽 Oṃ vajra gomā ya hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom badzrod ke h'um phat /🔽aom badzra pushpe h'um phat /
analyzed: aom badzrod ke h'um phat / aom badzra pushpe h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ vajra udaka hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ vajra puṣpe hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom badzra re khe h'um phat /
analyzed: aom badzra re khe h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ vajra rekhā hūṃ phaṭ.

original: ces pa'i sngags rnams kyis mandala byi dor bya ba'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: ces pa'i sngags rnams kyis mandala byi dor bya ba'i cho ga'o //
translated: With these mantras, one should perform the ritual of cleaning the maṇḍala.

original: yang lag pa g-yon pas me tog blangs la /
analyzed: yang lag pa g-yon pas me tog blangs la /
translated: Again, taking flowers with the left hand,

original: aom su re khe sarba ta th'a ga t'a dhi tishthantu sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom su re khe sarba ta th'a ga t'a dhi tishthantu sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ surukhe sarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhāna svāhā.

original: zhes pas mandala du'o //
analyzed: zhes pas mandala du'o //
translated: With this, in the maṇḍala.

original: phyi nas tho ba gshin rje gshed kyi sa bon gyis bkug ste /
analyzed: phyi nas tho ba gshin rje gshed kyi sa bon gyis bkug ste /
translated: Then, having summoned with the seed of the hammer Yamāntaka,

original: mandala gyi dbus su bsams nas /
analyzed: mandala gyi dbus su bsams nas /
translated: having imagined him in the center of the maṇḍala,

original: bcom ldan 'das mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das mchod par bya'o //
translated: one should make offerings to the Bhagavat.

original: aom bha ga w'an shr'i mam rakta ya m'anta ka badzra pushpa a'a:h'um pra tishtha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom bha ga w'an shr'i mam rakta ya m'anta ka badzra pushpa a'a:h'um pra tishtha sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ bhagavān śrīmān rakta yamāntaka vajra puṣpe āḥ hūṃ pratiṭṭha svāhā.

original: aom bha ga wa ti shr'i mam badzra be t'a li badzra pushpe pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom bha ga wa ti shr'i mam badzra be t'a li badzra pushpe pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ bhagavatī śrīmān vajravetālī vajra puṣpe pratīccha svāhā.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi skur bsgoms nas mchod pa bya ba ni /🔽aom r'a g'anta krita badzra pushpe a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi skur bsgoms nas mchod pa bya ba ni / aom r'a g'anta krita badzra pushpe a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
translated: Having meditated on the form of the Bhagavat, one should make offerings.🔽Oṃ rāgāntakṛta vajra puṣpe āḥ hūṃ pratīccha svāhā.

original: aom mo h'anta ba ti badzra pushpe pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /🔽aom mah'anta krita badzra pushpe a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom mo h'anta ba ti badzra pushpe pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a / aom mah'anta krita badzra pushpe a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ mohāntakṛta vajra puṣpe pratīccha svāhā.🔽Oṃ mahāntakṛta vajra puṣpe āḥ hūṃ pratīccha svāhā.

original: aom pi shu n'anta krita badzra pushpe a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom pi shu n'anta krita badzra pushpe a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ piśunāntakṛta vajra puṣpe āḥ hūṃ pratīccha svāhā.

original: aom dve sh'anta krita badzra pushpa a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom dve sh'anta krita badzra pushpa a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ, to the wrathful one, the vajra flower, āḥ, hūṃ, present, svāhā.🔽

original: aom airshya ra t'i badzra pushpam pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom airshya ra t'i badzra pushpam pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ, to Veśaṇṭakṛta vajra flower āḥ hūṃ prāṭiccha svāhā.🔽Oṃ, to Iṛṣyāvajrā, I offer a flower prāṭiccha svāhā.

original: aom mo ha ra t'i badzra pushpam pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /🔽aom dve sha ra t'i badzra pushpe pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom mo ha ra t'i badzra pushpam pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a / aom dve sha ra t'i badzra pushpe pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ, to Moharati vajra flower I offer prāṭiccha svāhā.🔽Oṃ, to Veśaśarati vajra flower I offer prāṭiccha svāhā.

original: aom airshya rat'i badzra pushpam pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /🔽aom danda ya m'anta ka badzra pushpe a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom airshya rat'i badzra pushpam pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a / aom danda ya m'anta ka badzra pushpe a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ, to Iṛṣyāvajrā I offer a flower prāṭiccha svāhā.🔽Oṃ, to Daṇḍāmantaka vajra flower āḥ hūṃ prāṭiccha svāhā.

original: aom mung+ga ra ya m'anta ka badzra pushpe a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom mung+ga ra ya m'anta ka badzra pushpe a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ, to Muṇḍāmantaka vajra flower āḥ hūṃ prāṭiccha svāhā.

original: aom padma ya m'anta ka @116a * //
analyzed: aom padma ya m'anta ka @116a * //
translated: Oṃ, to Padmānta-

original: badzra pushpe a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: badzra pushpe a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
translated: ka vajra flower āḥ hūṃ prāṭiccha svāhā.

original: aom khang+ga ya m'anta ka badzra pushpe a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom khang+ga ya m'anta ka badzra pushpe a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ, to Khaṅgāmantaka vajra flower āḥ hūṃ prāṭiccha svāhā.

original: aom ku m'a ra r'u pi ni dza:dza: h'um phat /
analyzed: aom ku m'a ra r'u pi ni dza:dza: h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ, to Kumārāruṇī jaḥ jaḥ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: me tog dbul ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: me tog dbul ba'i sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra for offering flowers.

original: aom d'i pta lo tsa ni bi kri t'a na na ma h'a tt'atta /
analyzed: aom d'i pta lo tsa ni bi kri t'a na na ma h'a tt'atta /
translated: Oṃ dīpaṃ loka-caraṇaṃ vīkṛtānanaṃ mahā-tta-tta

original: h'a sa n'a di ni d'ipta d'ipt'a ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: h'a sa n'a di ni d'ipta d'ipt'a ya sv'a h'a /
translated: hāsa-nadīni dīpta-dīptāya svāhā.

original: sgron ma'i sngags so //
analyzed: sgron ma'i sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra of the lamp.

original: aom hr'i:ha: he: phat /
analyzed: aom hr'i:ha: he: phat /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ ha ha he phaṭ.

original: bdug spos kyi sngags sa //
analyzed: bdug spos kyi sngags sa //
translated: This is the mantra of incense.

original: aom k'a la r'u ba sarba dusht'am sa tva da ma kam ma h'a bh'u ta pa ti ai mam ba lim gri hna pa ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom k'a la r'u ba sarba dusht'am sa tva da ma kam ma h'a bh'u ta pa ti ai mam ba lim gri hna pa ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ kālarūpa sarva-duṣṭān satva-damaka mahā-bhūta-pati imaṃ baliṃ gṛhṇa-pāya svāhā.

original: gtor ma'i sngags so //
analyzed: gtor ma'i sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra of the bali offering.

original: gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
analyzed: gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
translated: You are the nature of Mohavajra,

original: gshin rje gshed dgyes 'jigs pa po //
analyzed: gshin rje gshed dgyes 'jigs pa po //
translated: the terrifying one who delights in Yamarī,

original: ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin //
analyzed: ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin //
translated: the teacher who is the nature of all buddhas,

original: sku yi rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: sku yi rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise Body Vajra.

original: ser sna rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
analyzed: ser sna rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
translated: You are the nature of Mātsaryavajra,

original: gshin rje gshed dgyes 'jigs pa po //
analyzed: gshin rje gshed dgyes 'jigs pa po //
translated: the terrifying one who delights in Yamarī,

original: sems kyi rdo rje so sor gsal //
analyzed: sems kyi rdo rje so sor gsal //
translated: the individually clear mind vajra,

original: rin chen rdo rje phyag 'chal bstod //
analyzed: rin chen rdo rje phyag 'chal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise Ratnavajra.

original: 'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
analyzed: 'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
translated: You are the nature of Rāgavajra,

original: 'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso //
analyzed: 'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso //
translated: the foremost source of the dharma of passion,

original: gsung kun gyi ni mchog gi mchog / gsung gi rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: gsung kun gyi ni mchog gi mchog / gsung gi rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I praise and prostrate to Vajra Speech.

original: phrag dog rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
analyzed: phrag dog rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
translated: You are the nature of the vajra of jealousy,

original: gshin rje gshed po las thams cad //🔽sku yi rdo rje so sor ston //
analyzed: gshin rje gshed po las thams cad // sku yi rdo rje so sor ston //
translated: Slayer of Yama, all activities,🔽Displaying the vajra body,

original: lag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: lag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I praise and prostrate to Vajrapani.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod //
translated: You are the nature of all buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa /
translated: Embodiment of all buddhas,🔽Supreme of all buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog gi mchog / dkyil 'khor dbang phyug phyag 'chal bstod //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog gi mchog / dkyil 'khor dbang phyug phyag 'chal bstod //
translated: I praise and prostrate to the lord of the mandala.

original: ces pa tshigs su bcad pa lngas bstod pa bya'o //
analyzed: ces pa tshigs su bcad pa lngas bstod pa bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should praise with these five verses.

original: aom dza ya dza ya /
analyzed: aom dza ya dza ya /
translated: Om jaya jaya

original: su dza ya /
analyzed: su dza ya /
translated: sujaya

original: bi shva r'u pa dha ri gatstsha gatstsha /
analyzed: bi shva r'u pa dha ri gatstsha gatstsha /
translated: visvarupadhari gchata gchata

original: sva bh'a wa nam kri te na /
analyzed: sva bh'a wa nam kri te na /
translated: svabhavanakrite

original: ta th'a ga t'am shtsa sarba buddh'a shtsa bi sar dza ya ma ma k'aryam ku ru sv'a h'a /
analyzed: ta th'a ga t'am shtsa sarba buddh'a shtsa bi sar dza ya ma ma k'aryam ku ru sv'a h'a /
translated: tathagatam shashcha sarvabuddhashcha visarjaya mam karma kuru svaha

original: gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra for requesting departure.

original: aom badzra mandala /
analyzed: aom badzra mandala /
translated: Om vajra mandala

original: mu ni mu ni pu na r'a ga ma n'a ya mu: pu na ra /
analyzed: mu ni mu ni pu na r'a ga ma n'a ya mu: pu na ra /
translated: Muni muni punarāgamaya muḥ punarāgamaya muḥ.

original: bi ma da nu kamp'a dv'a m'a ga mishyanta p'a d'a:/
analyzed: bi ma da nu kamp'a dv'a m'a ga mishyanta p'a d'a:/
translated: Vimādanukampādvāmagamitśāntapādaḥ.

original: zhes pa 'di yis mandala yang dag par bsdus te /
analyzed: zhes pa 'di yis mandala yang dag par bsdus te /
translated: By this, the maṇḍala is properly gathered.

original: mchod rdzas kun brjes la dor ro //
analyzed: mchod rdzas kun brjes la dor ro //
translated: Having changed all the offering substances, discard them.

original: rnal 'byor pas 'od kyi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgoms te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas 'od kyi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgoms te /
translated: The yogī, having meditated on the maṇḍala wheel with the nature of light,

original: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rang gi snying gar sa bon bsgoms te /
analyzed: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rang gi snying gar sa bon bsgoms te /
translated: always meditates on the seed syllable in his heart without interruption.

original: de'i rjes su yi ge brgya pa'i gzungs ni /
analyzed: de'i rjes su yi ge brgya pa'i gzungs ni /
translated: After that, the dhāraṇī of the hundred syllables is:

original: aom ya m'anta ka sa ma ya /
analyzed: aom ya m'anta ka sa ma ya /
translated: Oṃ yamāntaka samaya.

original: ma nu p'a la ya /
analyzed: ma nu p'a la ya /
translated: Manupālāya.

original: ya m'anta ka tve no pa tishtha dri dho me bha ba /🔽su to shyo me bha ba /
analyzed: ya m'anta ka tve no pa tishtha dri dho me bha ba / su to shyo me bha ba /
translated: Yamāntaka tvenopatiṣṭha dṛḍho me bhava.🔽 Sutoṣyo me bhava.

original: su po shyo me bha ba /
analyzed: su po shyo me bha ba /
translated: Supoṣyo me bhava.

original: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
analyzed: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
translated: Anurākto me bhava.

original: sarba @116b siddhi mme pra yatstsha /
analyzed: sarba @116b siddhi mme pra yatstsha /
translated: Sarvasiddhiṃ me prayaccha.🔽 Sarva karmasu ca me cittaṃ śreyaḥ kuru hūṃ.

original: sarba karm'a su tsa me tsittam shre ya: ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga b'an sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva aa: zhes pas yi ge brgya pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: sarba karm'a su tsa me tsittam shre ya: ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga b'an sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva aa: zhes pas yi ge brgya pa'i sngags so //
translated: sarvakarmāsu cime cittaṃ śreyākuru hūṃ ha ha ha ha hoḥ | bhagavān sarvatathāgatavajra mā me muñca vajrī bhava mahāsamayasatva aḥ.

original: 'di brjod nas 'dod pa'i lha'i nga rgyal gyis ji lta bar gnas pa bya'o //
analyzed: 'di brjod nas 'dod pa'i lha'i nga rgyal gyis ji lta bar gnas pa bya'o //
translated: Having recited this, one should abide in the pride of the desired deity as is appropriate.

original: gshin rje gshed dmar po mandala du mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
analyzed: gshin rje gshed dmar po mandala du mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
translated: The Ritual of Worship in the Maṇḍala of Red Yamāri

original: dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: is completed.

original: // / lha'i skad la legs par zhugs pa'i sh'akya'i dge slong nyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / lha'i skad la legs par zhugs pa'i sh'akya'i dge slong nyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o//
translated: Translated at the glorious monastery of Tholing, the seat of the two-language speakers, by the Śākya bhikṣu Śrīdhara, who is well versed in the language of the gods.
